sentence.Network_en: The account of spiritual struggle that follows has a humbling and numinous power.
sentence.Network_cn: 之后关于精神挣扎的叙述有一种令人心生卑微之感的神秘力量。

sentence.Network_en: They led me to a numinous place that day.
sentence.Network_cn: 那天他们领着我去了一个神秘的地方。

sentence.Network_en: Ms Rowling's magic world has no place for the numinous.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗琳笔下的魔法世界里,没有神秘主义的立足之地.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方教育科技集团 > 新东方 > 详细信息 ... Luminous 发光的，明亮的 Numinous 精神上的，超自然的 Perspicacity 敏锐，聪慧.
luminary n. 杰出人物,名人numinous a. 庄严的,神圣的lustrous a. 有光泽的

list.abs: a numinous wood ; the most numinous moment in the Mass .神木；弥撒中最神圣的时刻。
a numinous wood ; the most numinous moment in the Mass., 神木 ; 弥撒中最神圣的时刻.
...种神圣观念，这表现在他们的偶像崇拜中，…但它们对于神圣实体（the numinous）的观念具有一元论的内涵，即确认所有层次和类 …
...抵制，但更根本上是由佛教自身的内在要求决定的––对神圣奥秘(the numinous)的追求仍然是佛教不可或缺的精神维度。
the moon is a stone ; but it is a highly numinous stone . or , to be more precise , it is and because of which and women have numinous feelings .月亮是块石头，但它是块神秘的石头，或更确切，正因为它，世间男女有了神秘之情。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin numen, numin- 'divine will' + -ous

entry.def: Things that are numinous seem holy or spiritual and mysterious.

example.ex: The account of spiritual struggle that follows has a humbling and numinous power.
example.tran: 之后关于精神挣扎的叙述有一种令人心生卑微之感的神秘力量。

means.word_mean: 1. evincing the presence of a deity;

sentences.sentence: "the most numinous moment in the Mass"

means.word_mean: 2. of or relating to or characteristic of a numen

auth_sentence.content: To children, the earth appears...beautiful and numinous.
auth_sentence.res_content: To children, the earth appears...beautiful and numinous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To children, the earth appears...beautiful and numinous.

auth_sentence.content: He felt shrouded in a numinous aura.
auth_sentence.res_content: He felt shrouded in a numinous aura.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He felt shrouded in a numinous aura.

auth_sentence.content: Certainly the phenomena of emergence seems deeply mysterious - numinous - to my human mind.
auth_sentence.res_content: Certainly the phenomena of emergence seems deeply mysterious - numinous - to my human mind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Certainly the phenomena of emergence seems deeply mysterious - numinous - to my human mind.

means.word_mean: 神圣的，神秘的;超自然的
